definition: national politics/archaic rank, "Minister of State"/common given name
China University of Political Science and Law, Beijing, with undergraduate campus at Changping 昌平[Chang1 ping2], and graduate campus in Haidian district 海澱區|海淀区[Hai3 dian4 qu1]
pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Zheng4 fa3 Da4 xue2
yi1 ge4 Zhong1 guo2 zheng4 ce4

sentences.english: The South Korean government spends millions promoting contemporary Korean culture abroad.
sentences.chinese: 韩国政府花了数百万的钱推广当代韩国文化。

sentences.english: Chinese government is popular with the people because the government brings stability and wealth to the people.
sentences.chinese: 中国政府却因为为人民带来了稳定和财富而深得民心。

sentences.english: The government has also engaged Western experts in crisis management.
sentences.chinese: 中国政府还致力于提高政府公共危机管理水平。

sentences.english: He said some secrecy was important to avoid detection by the two governments.
sentences.chinese: 他表示为避免两国政府侦查发现，保密工作很重要。

sentences.english: Will the Chinese Government allow this kind of protest during the May Day?
sentences.chinese: 中国政府是否允许“五一”期间发生这类抗议活动？

sentences.english: The government’s full-year inflation target is 3 percent.
sentences.chinese: 中国政府全年的通货膨胀率目标为3%。

sentences.english: While there, he plans totake a high-speed train ride from Beijing to Tianjin, said government spokesman Yongyuth Mayalarp said.
sentences.chinese: 他计划坐高铁从北京到天津，泰国政府发言人说。

sentences.english: Expo 010 is organized by Chinese Government, and operated by the city of Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 上海世博会由中国政府主办上海市承办。

sentences.english: The Chinese government has pledged to give the promotion of cross-Strait relations higher priority.
sentences.chinese: 中国政府保证会把促进两岸关系放在优先的位置上。

sentences.english: Implicitly, the UK government is guaranteeing the liabilities of the swollen UK banks.
sentences.chinese: 含蓄地说，英国政府在为英国银行庸肿的债务作保。

sentences.english: The Chinese Government regrets your action.
sentences.chinese: 中国政府对你方采取的行动表示遗憾。

sentences.english: The first Canton Fair was held in 1957 by the Chinese government.
sentences.chinese: 广交会是中国政府在1957年创办的。

sentences.english: He hoped that USG would review the decision.
sentences.chinese: 他希望美国政府能重新检讨此项决定。

sentences.english: Beijing is already taking such measures under its five-year economic plan.
sentences.chinese: 中国政府已经在其经济发展五年计划采取了此类措施。

sentences.english: Johnson’s brazenness put him in the crosshairs of the U.S. government.
sentences.chinese: 约翰逊的狂妄不羁使他被美国政府盯上了。

sentences.english: The Chinese Government attaches great importance to this ESCAP session.
sentences.chinese: 中国政府高度重视本次ESCAP会议。

definition: laws and discipline of imperial court
all levels of society/the imperial court and the ordinary people
to hold a court audience/to govern from the imperial throne (applies esp. to Empress Dowager or Regent)
